LanguageData.FueledGeneratorL.label: large power generator
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorL.description: With more wood burning to generate electricity, energy consumption is reduced by 20%, and fuel must be added manually.
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorL_Blueprint.label: large power generator(blueprint)
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorL_Frame.label: large power generator(building)
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorL_Frame.description: With more wood burning to generate electricity, energy consumption is reduced by 20%, and fuel must be added manually.
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorXL.label: 超大型火力发电机
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorXL.description: 超大型火力发电机，大幅度降低能源消耗。

LanguageData.FueledGeneratorXL_Frame.description: 超大型火力发电机，大幅度降低能源消耗。
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorHai.label: nuclear fusion power station
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorHai.description: The controllable stable nuclear fusion device can output power safely and steadily.
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorHai_Blueprint.label: Nuclear fusion power station(blueprint)
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorHai_Frame.label: Nuclear fusion power station(building)
LanguageData.FueledGeneratorHai_Frame.description: The controllable stable nuclear fusion device can output power safely and steadily.
LanguageData.Dianchi.label: graphene battery
LanguageData.Dianchi.description: Graphene battery, due to the extremely thin graphene material, has very limited cation mobility. The battery made by this technology has higher charging efficiency, faster speed and larger capacity.
LanguageData.Dianchi_Blueprint.label: graphene battery(blueprint)
LanguageData.Dianchi_Blueprint_Install.label: graphene battery(blueprint)
LanguageData.Dianchi_Frame.label: graphene battery(building)
LanguageData.Dianchi_Frame.description: Graphene battery, due to the extremely thin graphene material, has very limited cation mobility. The battery made by this technology has higher charging efficiency, faster speed and larger capacity.
